overview: A valiant family of congressmen (father Michael Say and his two sons Solomon and Morgan) calling themselves the Ilocano Defenders, have made it their mission to help and provide protection to the weak and downtrodden. When there was a rash of kidnappings of children going on in Northern Luzon, the Defenders were in the forefront of the fight even as the syndicate expanded their operations to other regions of the country.
title: Ilocano Fighters: War on Kidnapping
